SIMRES.SCRIPT:
# load bi-spectral source set SOURCE FLUXTAB ESS2016_W2_thermal_5ms.tab:ESS2016_W2_cold_5ms.tab XML SOURCE
# set wavelength #------------------------- set INST LAMBDA 2 XML UPDATE
# set wavelength range # ------------------------------ # fraction of LAMBDA: set SOURCE LAMW 1.0 XML SOURCE
# set sample slit as needed #-------------------------------------- # open by default set SL3 SIZE(1) 100.0 set SL3 SIZE(2) 100.0 XML SL3
#----------------------------------------------------------------- # WAVELENGTH SELECTION MODES #---------------------------------------------------------------- # NOTE: always start with mode 0 before executing the script for swicthing to another mode #
#--------------------------------------------------- # mode mw=0, all choppers stopped #---------------------------------------------------- # FC1A off set FC1A FRQ 0.0 set FC1A TIMING 0:1 set FC1A T0 0 set FC1A LOCKT0 0 XML FC1A # FC1B off set FC1B FRQ 0.0 set FC1B TIMING 0:1 set FC1B T0 0 set FC1B LOCKT0 0 XML FC1B # FC2A off set FC2A FRQ 0.0 set FC2A TIMING 0:1 set FC2A T0 0 set FC2A LOCKT0 0 XML FC2A # FC2B off set FC2B FRQ 0.0 set FC2B TIMING 0:1 set FC2B T0 0 set FC2B LOCKT0 0 XML FC2B
#--------------------------------------------------- # mode mw=1, single frame #---------------------------------------------------- # FC1A on set FC1A FRQ 14.0 set FC1A TIMING -0.047222:1 XML FC1A # FC2A off set FC2A FRQ 14.0 set FC2A TIMING 0:1 XML FC2A
#--------------------------------------------------- # mode mw=2, double frame frame, pulse suppression #---------------------------------------------------- # possible only with a modulation mode # FC1A on set FC1A FRQ 7.0 set FC1A TIMING 0:1 XML FC1A # FC2A off set FC2A FRQ 7.0 set FC2A TIMING 0:1 XML FC2A
#--------------------------------------------------- # mode mw=3, double frame frame, alternate frames #---------------------------------------------------- # possible only with a modulation mode # FC1A on, FC1B on set FC1A FRQ 14.0 set FC1A TIMING 0:1 XML FC1A set FC1B FRQ 0 set FC1B TIMING 0:1 XML FC1B # FC2A off, FC2B on set FC2B FRQ 7.0 set FC2B TIMING 0:1 XML FC2B
#------------------------------------------------------------------------- # RESOLUTION MODES #------------------------------------------------------------------------- # NOTE: always start with mode 0 before executing the script for swicthing to another mode
#----------------------------------------------- # mode 0: all choppers stopped #-------------------------------------------------
# modulation A off set MCA FRQ 0 set MCA ADJ 1 set MCA OVERLAP 0 set MCA T0 0 set MCA LOCKT0 0 XML MCA # modulation B off set MCB FRQ 0 set MCB ADJ 1 set MCB OVERLAP 0 set MCB T0 0 set MCB LOCKT0 0 XML MCB # modulation C off set MCC FRQ 0 set MCC ADJ 1 set MCC OVERLAP 0 set MCC T0 0 set MCC LOCKT0 0 XML MCC # PSC1 off set PSC1 FRQ 0.0 set PSC1 TIMING 0:1 set PSC1 T0 0 set PSC1 LOCKT0 0 XML PSC1 # PSC2 off set PSC2 FRQ 0.0 set PSC2 TIMING 0:1 set PSC2 T0 0 set PSC2 LOCKT0 0 XML PSC2 # PSC3 off set PSC3 FRQ 0.0 set PSC3 TIMING 0:1 set PSC3 T0 0 set PSC3 LOCKT0 0 XML PSC3 # Open slits and put GEX1 on by default set SL1 SIZE(1) 40.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 40.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 60.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 1: high resolution, PSC1 + PSC2 #------------------------------------------------------ # PSC1 off set PSC1 FRQ 168.0 set PSC1 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC1 T0 1 set PSC1 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC1 set PSC2 FRQ -168.0 set PSC2 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC2 T0 1 set PSC2 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC2 set GCA3 DIST 77 XML GCA3 set GCB DIST 287 XML GCB set SL1 SIZE(1) 22.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 15.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 2: medium resolution, PSC1 + PSC2 #------------------------------------------------------ set PSC1 FRQ 168.0 set PSC1 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC1 T0 1 set PSC1 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC1 set PSC2 FRQ -168.0 set PSC2 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC2 T0 1 set PSC2 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC2 set GCA3 DIST 277 XML GCA3 set GCB DIST 87 XML GCB set SL1 SIZE(1) 35.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 20.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 3: low resolution, PSC1 + PSC3 #------------------------------------------------------ set PSC1 FRQ 168.0 set PSC1 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC1 T0 1 set PSC1 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC1 set PSC3 FRQ -168.0 set PSC3 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC3 T0 1 set PSC3 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC3 set SL1 SIZE(1) 40.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 25.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 4: modulation, high-resolution, MCA #------------------------------------------------------ # NOTE: slits SL1/SL2 should be optimized for given wavelength. # The values below are set for lambda=1.65 AA. set MCA FRQ 280.0 set MCA OVERLAP 1 set MCA T0 1 set MCA LOCKT0 0 XML MCA set SL1 SIZE(1) 15.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 13.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 60.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 0 0 0 0 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 5: modulation, low-resolution, MCA #------------------------------------------------------ # NOTE: slits SL1/SL2 should be optimized for given wavelength. # The values below are set for lambda=1.65 AA. set MCA FRQ 70.0 set MCA OVERLAP 1 set MCA T0 1 set MCA LOCKT0 0 XML MCA set SL1 SIZE(1) 40.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 25.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 6: modulation, high-resolution, MCB (larger peak separation) #------------------------------------------------------ # NOTE: slits SL1/SL2 should be optimized for given wavelength. # The values below are set for lambda=1.65 AA. set MCB FRQ 280.0 set MCB OVERLAP 1 set MCB T0 1 set MCB LOCKT0 0 XML MCB set SL1 SIZE(1) 15.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 13.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 0 0 0 0 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 7: imaging, #------------------------------------------------------ # As mode=3, but slits set for imaging set PSC1 FRQ 168.0 set PSC1 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC1 T0 1 set PSC1 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC1 set PSC3 FRQ -168.0 set PSC3 TIMING 0.2:1 set PSC3 T0 1 set PSC3 LOCKT0 1 XML PSC3 set SL1 SIZE(1) 20.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 20.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 30.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 30.0 XML SL2 set SL3 SIZE(1) 100.0 set SL3 SIZE(2) 100.0 XML SL3 set GEX1 ACTIVE 0 0 0 0 XML GEX1
#----------------------------------------------------------------------- # COLD NEUTRONS - modulation modes setting #-----------------------------------------------------------------------
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 4: modulation, high-resolution, MCA #------------------------------------------------------ # NOTE: slits SL1/SL2 should be optimized for given wavelength. # The values below are set for lambda=1.65 AA. set MCA FRQ 280.0 set MCA OVERLAP 1 set MCA T0 1 set MCA LOCKT0 0 XML MCA set SL1 SIZE(1) 9.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 70.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 9.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 45.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 0 0 0 0 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 5: modulation, low-resolution, MCA #------------------------------------------------------ # NOTE: slits SL1/SL2 should be optimized for given wavelength. # The values below are set for lambda=1.65 AA. set MCA FRQ 70.0 set MCA OVERLAP 1 set MCA T0 1 set MCA LOCKT0 0 XML MCA set SL1 SIZE(1) 25.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 18.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 1 1 1 1 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # mode 6: modulation, high-resolution, MCB (larger peak separation) #------------------------------------------------------ # NOTE: slits SL1/SL2 should be optimized for given wavelength. # The values below are set for lambda=1.65 AA. set MCB FRQ 280.0 set MCB OVERLAP 1 set MCB T0 1 set MCB LOCKT0 0 XML MCB set SL1 SIZE(1) 9.0 set SL1 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL1 set SL2 SIZE(1) 9.0 set SL2 SIZE(2) 80.0 XML SL2 set GEX1 ACTIVE 0 0 0 0 XML GEX1
#------------------------------------------------------ # COLLIMATORS #------------------------------------------------------ # in RAD, load appropriate component RAD_xmm.rxcp, where x=collimation width. # Then set correct distances:
# 0.5 mm: set RAD DIST 100.0 XML RAD set DET DIST 1900.0 XML DET
# 1.0 mm: set RAD DIST 160.0 XML RAD set DET DIST 1840.0 XML DET
# 2.0 mm: set RAD DIST 310.0 XML RAD set DET DIST 1690.0 XML DET
# 4.0 mm: set RAD DIST 490.0 XML RAD set DET DIST 1510.0 XML DET
